thread.title: Colts request 'DeflateThisBrady' blimp not be flown over Lucas Oil Stadium during Patriots game

title: Colts request 'DeflateThisBrady' blimp not be flown over Lucas Oil Stadium during Patriots game
text:
Published By: Indy Star: Sports - Today 
Some Colts fans reportedly asked a sign company to fly a banner on a blimp that reads '#DeflateThisBrady.' ...
